element.name: legacympegvideoparse
element.description: Parses and frames MPEG-1 and MPEG-2 elementary video streams
element.author: Wim Taymans <wim.taymans@chello.be>, Jan Schmidt <thaytan@mad.scientist.com>

caps.name: src
caps.details: video/mpeg, mpegversion=(int)[ 1, 2 ], parsed=(boolean)true, systemstream=(boolean)false, width=(int)[ 16, 4096 ], height=(int)[ 16, 4096 ], pixel-aspect-ratio=(fraction)[ 0/1, 2147483647/1 ], framerate=(fraction)[ 0/1, 2147483647/1 ]
